author: terencechain
content:
I just got an invalid block on mainnet because of block hash missmatch
```
Jun 02 11:50:02 t beacon-chain[58905]: time="2025-06-02 11:50:02" level=error msg="Got a validation error in newPayload" error="blockhash mismatch, want 1cce1438350a1d66aafeb032a3673a12e027d48cb604cfb7dcfac69b7111c174, got 6d0af33f70ba224675b78181c8385b80887ee701ac4c5d56e29fbed1477af53d" prefix=execution
Jun 02 11:50:03 t beacon-chain[58905]: time="2025-06-02 11:50:03" level=error msg="Could not handle p2p pubsub" error="could not notify the engine of the new payload: received an INVALID payload from execution engine" prefix=sync topic="/eth2/ad532ceb/beacon_block/ssz_snappy"
```
